body_html:
@jart @wicke I am out for a few days. Could you take a look?
…
On Dec 13, 2017 8:44 AM, "Robin Richtsfeld" ***@***.***> wrote: @gunan <https://github.com/gunan> What I said about runfiles was about same issue faced when trying to use TensorFlow from within the source directory <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/35953210/error-running-basic-tensorflow-example> . Because the runfiles directory has the same issue, I had to introduce this minor hack <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/15166/files#diff-627a2a073a8f26eae4124d586f145cc5R30> to make it work. Not ideal of course, but should be fine. If you wanna suggest a different solution, I keep an open ear. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#15166 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AHlCOQ80EL-89n9dFL_jaNYB29wLMEKEks5s__7ZgaJpZM4Q4hZe> .
body_text:
@jart @wicke I am out for a few days. Could you take a look?
…
On Dec 13, 2017 8:44 AM, "Robin Richtsfeld" ***@***.***> wrote:
 @gunan <https://github.com/gunan> What I said about runfiles was about
 same issue faced when trying to use TensorFlow from within the source
 directory
 <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/35953210/error-running-basic-tensorflow-example>
 .
 Because the runfiles directory has the same issue, I had to introduce this
 minor hack
 <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/15166/files#diff-627a2a073a8f26eae4124d586f145cc5R30>
 to make it work.
 Not ideal of course, but should be fine. If you wanna suggest a different
 solution, I keep an open ear.

 —
 You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
 Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
 <#15166 (comment)>,
 or mute the thread
 <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AHlCOQ80EL-89n9dFL_jaNYB29wLMEKEks5s__7ZgaJpZM4Q4hZe>
 .
body:
@jart @wicke I am out for a few days. Could you take a look?

On Dec 13, 2017 8:44 AM, "Robin Richtsfeld" <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> @gunan <https://github.com/gunan> What I said about runfiles was about
> same issue faced when trying to use TensorFlow from within the source
> directory
> <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/35953210/error-running-basic-tensorflow-example>
> .
> Because the runfiles directory has the same issue, I had to introduce this
> minor hack
> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/15166/files#diff-627a2a073a8f26eae4124d586f145cc5R30>
> to make it work.
> Not ideal of course, but should be fine. If you wanna suggest a different
> solution, I keep an open ear.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/15166#issuecomment-351448537>,
> or mute the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AHlCOQ80EL-89n9dFL_jaNYB29wLMEKEks5s__7ZgaJpZM4Q4hZe>
> .
>
